sidebar.mayor_word_content: Hello and welcome to the Vaise quarter website. I invite you to discover this warm and sociable place throw different rubrics. You will learn more about the Vaise mood.

usefull_links.title: Town hall
usefull_links.description: The city hall of Vaise can inform you about the various administrative points.

usefull_links.title: Vaise's train station
usefull_links.description: Direct access to Vaise quarter by train. Please consult schedule on SNCF website below.

usefull_links.title: TCL Vaise
usefull_links.description: Move in Vaise by subway, with the public transportation of Lyon.

usefull_links.title: Vaise's library
usefull_links.description: The library offers you a relaxation moment.

everyday.description: Brings all transportation means available in Vaise to insure your travel between different locations or events. You will be able to optimize your visits by booking online tickets (SNCF or TCL)
Discover the best restaurants and bars in Vaise's quarter. You might taste gourmets and good wine. You will go throw bars and restaurants from Vaise during your visit.
Heart of the activity in Vaise, Meet shops in a good mood.
You want to participate to the associative life, don't hesitate more, go ahead! From sport association to AMAP (Food association for student). Find here all associations.

Perfect for a break in you Vaise visit, the hotels are here to recharge your batteries. Central point of Vaise, you might discover different mood and style. Click here to consult their websites and know more details.
